name: Imscared (Rpg Remake)
description:
This game will be for my Jam "RPG JAM - Hard Narrative" https://itch.io/jam/rpg-maker-narrative

And is based on Imscared by Ivan Zanotti
https://gamejolt.com/games/imscared-a-pixelated-nightmare/10058

You may notice the file you download is different, it is just a new patched version of Imscared (RPG REMAKE). If for some reason you want to play the unpatched version you can go to the gamejolt page it IS an option.
